```{=html}
<style>
  .person-card {
    cursor: pointer;
    border: 1px solid #ccc;
    padding: 10px;
    margin: 10px;
    width: 300px;
    transition: all 0.3s;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
  }

  .person-card.clicked {
    width: 500px; /* Adjust the width as needed */
  }

  .person-card .content-wrapper {
    display: none;
    flex-grow: 1;
    padding-right: 20px;
  }

  .person-card.clicked .content-wrapper {
    display: block;
  }

  .person-card img {
    max-width: 100%;
    height: auto;
  }
</style>

<script>
  function toggleCard(card) {
    card.classList.toggle('clicked');
  }
</script>

<div class="person-card" onclick="toggleCard(this)">
  <h3>Person One</h3>
  <img src="files/images/logo_mitnb.png" alt="Person Image">
  <div class="content-wrapper">
    <ul>
      <li><strong>Position:</strong> Assistant Professor, Psychometrics, MITNB University</li>
      <li><strong>Research Interests:</strong> Machine Learning, Data Visualization</li>
      <li><strong>Contact Information:</strong> Email: person@example.com</li>
    </ul>
  </div>
</div>

```
